task_description: 将灌汤包海报（深蓝色背景）中的包子元素转换为Pixar 3D ICON风格

operation_params.style_reference: Pixar 3D cartoon style for food elements only, Q-version cute design, high-gloss ceramic texture, professional lighting
operation_params.additional_prompt: Transform ONLY the steamed buns (baozi) in this poster into Pixar 3D ICON style while preserving all text elements ("灌汤包", "专统手工包点", "每长口皆是最简的时造") and poster layout. Convert the 9 white baozi into 3D with glossy soft texture, clear spiral pleats on top, subtle shadows, and steam effects. Keep the dark blue background and bamboo steamer pattern. Maintain text clarity and poster composition. 1024x1024px, commercial quality.

metadata.notes: HOO XIANG品牌灌汤包海报3D转换（深蓝色背景版）
